sentences.english: Scribbling can help infants and toddlers learn to draw and express themselves.
sentences.chinese: 狂草可以幫助嬰幼兒學畫畫和表達自己。

sentences.english: Objective To review the surgical treatment of 681 infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結681例嬰幼兒先天性心臟病外科治療經驗。

sentences.english: A bulb syringe is often used for oral and nasal suction on infants and children .
sentences.chinese: 常常使用球吸引器抽吸嬰幼兒的口鼻。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Qingfeifang in treating cough.
sentences.chinese: 觀察清肺定哮方加減治療嬰幼兒毛細支氣管炎的效果。

sentences.english: Applicable only to milk-based infant formula of calcium pantothenate or other free forms of pantothenic acid.
sentences.chinese: 本方法適用於含泛酸鈣及遊離泛酸的奶基嬰幼兒食品。

sentences.english: Individual history of hypersensitivity disease in infant asthma has more value than that in the older one.
sentences.chinese: 嬰幼兒個人過敏性疾病史對診斷哮喘較年長兒有價值。

sentences.english: The most widespread children's illnesses were those that affected their respiratory systems.
sentences.chinese: 嬰幼兒最易患的是呼吸系統疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the etiological factors and antibiotics application in infantile diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析嬰幼兒腹瀉的病因及抗生素的使用指徵。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship of age with mutans streptococci (MS) colonization in infants and toddlers .
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解變形鏈球菌在嬰幼兒牙面上的定植時間。

sentences.english: It often shows up in infancy or early childhood, causing anemia and jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 通常在嬰幼兒時期開始以貧血與黃膽出現。

sentences.english: Infant and Child Care Practicum is a core course required by the Infant and Child Care Department of National Taipei College of Nursing (NTCN).
sentences.chinese: 是臺北護理學院嬰幼兒保育系相當重要的核心科目。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of transcatheter closure patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) in infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討經導管堵塞嬰幼兒動脈導管未閉的療效。

sentences.english: Outside his church in Seoul a sign says "Place to leave babies."
sentences.chinese: 在過去一年裏，李牧師的教會救助了六名嬰幼兒。

sentences.english: This past year, six infants and small children were rescued at Lee's church.
sentences.chinese: 在過去一年裏，李牧師的教會救助了六名嬰幼兒。

sentences.english: This paper introduces professor Lu Jingen's experience in treating infantile anal fistula.
sentences.chinese: 介紹陸金根教授辨治嬰幼兒肛瘻的臨證經驗。

sentences.english: From birth, both babies had been given breast milk and formula.
sentences.chinese: 從出生開始，姐弟倆就同時喝着母乳和嬰幼兒配方乳。

definition: range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
variant Chinese character/alternative form of a Chinese character
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
